portalConfig.name: Zookeeper Cluster
Zookeeper Node
portalConfig.content:
[configuration] width-units = 2 height-units = 2 update-interval = 15 second timespan = 1 day offset-right = 50 entity = ${entity}
[group] [widget] type = chart title = Latency: ${entity} multiple-series = true
[series] label = Min metric = jmx.zookeeper.minrequestlatency
[series] label = Max metric = jmx.zookeeper.maxrequestlatency
[series] label = Average metric = jmx.zookeeper.avgrequestlatency
[widget] type = chart title = Network I/O: ${entity} mode = column-stack
[series] metric = jmx.zookeeper.packetsreceived alias = packets_received statistic = delta display = false
[series] value = Math.max(value('packets_received'), 0) label = Packets received
[series] metric = jmx.zookeeper.packetssent alias = packets_sent replace-value = -value statistic = delta display = false
[series] value = Math.min(value('packets_sent'), 0) series-type = detail label = Packets sent
[group] [widget] type = chart title = Outstanding requests: ${entity} mode = column-stack
[series] metric = jmx.zookeeper.outstandingrequests label = Outstanding requests
[widget] type = chart title = Connections: ${entity}
[series] metric = jmx.zookeeper.numaliveconnections label = Alive connections

portalConfig.name: Zookeeper Nodes
portalConfig.content:
[configuration] width-units = 2 height-units = 2 update-interval = 15 second offset-right = 50 entities = ${entities}
[group] [widget] type = chart title = Average latency timespan = 15 minute multiple-series = true label-format=entity alert-expression = (new Date()).getTime() - time > 120 * 1000 alert-style = background-color: red
[series] metric = jmx.zookeeper.avgrequestlatency
[widget] type = table title = Last online column-time = Last online column-metric = null column-value = null multiple-series = true
alert-expression = (new Date()).getTime() - time > 120 * 1000 alert-style = background-color: red
[series] metric = jmx.zookeeper.packetsreceived
[group] widgets-per-row = 1
[widget] width-units = 2 type = property expand-tags = true transpose = true hide-column = column.key.indexOf('version') == 0 || column.key.indexOf('quorumaddress') == 0 title = jmx.zookeeper.conf [property] type = jmx.zookeeper.conf
